p: During the potato growing seasons (April-September) from 1965 to 2014 in northern China, the average precipitation suitability index during the whole growth season showed a slightly decreasing trend and declined 0.008 every ten years, with an average of 0.452. The maximum precipitation suitability index value was found in 2004 (0.816), and the minimum value was found in 2012 (0.307).
